## Source: ossf-package-analysis (70f1ae5751b98883dfc590695bffd797529d562c393e6e598788afd7d5dbea7f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'pytorch-lighting' @ 95.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
